snippet: Some YouTube channels that were announced in October are beginning to provide content, raising hopes that they can attract enough subscribers to raise advertising rates.
abstract: YouTube is spending more than $100 million to develop some 100 entertainment channels featuring original content, like news, music, gaming and fashion, that is closer to type seen on television than home video; site, in escalating battle with other Internet platforms like Hulu, Netflix and AOL, is seeking to attract subscribers and allow it to raise advertising rates.
lead_paragraph: Some YouTube channels that were announced in October are beginning to provide content, raising hopes that they can attract enough subscribers to raise advertising rates.

headline.seo: YouTube Channels Seek Advertisers and Audiences
headline.main: New Layer of Content Amid Chaos on YouTube
headline.print_headline: New Layer Of Content Amid Chaos On YouTube
